PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

SectionMainHomeTitle.desc: those who care with those who need help.

SectionMainHomeDesc.text: Lets work together to help our brothers and sisters who are being hit by a disaster. One rupee from you is definitely valuable to them.

FormOneTimeDonatiom.title: One Time Donation
FormOneTimeDonatiom.notes: The donations you make are used to run the programs that have been prepared by the Human Initiative. If you want to donate to a specific program please click

SectionTwoHome.title: Together We Create Real Change for Humanity
SectionTwoHome.desc: Human Initiative is here to provide sustainable solutions for the humanitarian movement, creating real change that restores hope, empowers communities, and builds a better future for all.

SectionThreeHome.title: Human Initiative
SectionThreeHome.desc: Through innovative humanitarian programs, we have become a beacon of hope for millions of lives, turning crisis into opportunity and building a better future for communities around the world.â€‹

SectionFourHome.title: News and Stories
SectionFourHome.desc: Stay informed with latest development on human initiative campaigns to keep you engaged.

SectionSixHome.title: Explore Knowledge and Inspiration: Discover Our Publications and Collections!

footerSection.descFooter: Human Initiative is committed to implementing an Anti-Bribery Management System that does not allow all forms of bribery and gratuities, and will not support or provide funds/materials to individuals or organizations known to advocate, support, or engage in illegal activities, violence, money laundering or terrorism.â€‹

sectionTwo.title: About of Human Initiative
sectionTwo.descone: Human Initiative is a global humanitarian organization that continues to strive to provide more meaningful benefits with multi-stakeholder support.
sectionTwo.desctwo: Founded in Indonesia on December 10, 1999, the Human Initiative carries out the Theory of Change (TOC) strategy which focuses on the positive impact of program implementation on the community and makes the Humanitarian-Development Nexus the scope of the program.â€‹
sectionTwo.descthree: This is derived in four main program pillars, namely the Initiative for Empowerment, Initiative for Children, Initiative for Disaster Risk Management, and Initiative for Infrastructure where humans are the mainstream of program interventions.â€‹

sectionFour.descOrganization: Strengthen organizational governance that is adaptive, innovative, and has global reach.â€‹
sectionFour.descResource: Strengthening inclusive collaboration among stakeholders in humanitarian crisis response and community development.â€‹
sectionFour.descImpact: Develop programs by optimizing community resources to encourage self-reliance

sectionSix.desc: A global humanitarian organization initiated by Indonesian Muslims, which acts as a catalyst for change in building sustainable community resilience.â€‹

sectionSeven.desc: We always move together to bring hope and positive change. In the spirit of cooperation, we believe the future of humanity can be better and full of opportunities to realize a more caring world.

sectionEight.title: Story
sectionEight.desc: To us, history is an inspiration to continue doing our best today and in the future.â€‹

sectionTwelve.title: Contact Us
sectionTwelve.pdesc: Fill out the form or send an email

sectionOne.titletwo: With small steps, you can make a big difference. Donate now and help those in need.

sectionTwo.desc: We help survivors of war rebuild their lives and choose their own futures

sectionOne.titleOne: Be Part of the Change with Us
sectionOne.desc: Register yourself as a Program Entitlement Candidate to get humanitarian assistance and create positive change with us.

sectionTwo.title: What is Rights holder?
sectionTwo.desc: Prospective Program Rights Holder are Individuals or Communities who meet certain criteria to become recipients of the humanitarian assistance programs run by the Human Initiative. The programs that can be accessed by the community consist of the fields of education, health, economy and social humanity.

sectionThree.titleTwo: We Help Those Who Need It
sectionThree.desc: Register yourself to become a prospective program rights holder

sectionFour.desc: We help survivors of war rebuild their lives and choose their own futures
